data.title: 1840s (estimated) King Christian IX and Queen Louise of Denmark as Prince and Princess
data.meta_description: Louise of Hesse-Kassel, shown here, married Prince Christian Glucksberg in 1842; through diplomatic intricacies, he became King Christian IX in 1863.
data.text:
Louise of Hesse-Kassel, shown here, married Prince Christian Glucksberg in 1842; through diplomatic intricacies, he became King Christian IX in 1863. He had a claim to Danish throne; so did she. She renounced her rights.

Posted to the Alexander Palace Time Machine Discussion Forum by Zanthia on 18 June 2006.
